TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 668
TEI.2.document_title: S Rhoads Fisher to Stephen F Austin, 06-22-1831

barker_notes.barker_summary: S. Rhoads Fisher to Austin, June 22, 1831. Wants Austin's assistance in acquiring 8 leagues of land. Plans for town of Matagorda. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 668

div1.p: S. Rhoads Fisher to Austin, June 22, 1831. Wants Austin's assistance in acquiring 8 leagues of land. Plans for town of Matagorda. (Omitted.)
